content:
Hi all!

From the threads and issues I have found on the topic it seems like having the extra-link-args feature stabilized will be valuable for some users (including some users here at Microsoft) and I haven't seen any significant concerns beyond requests to extend the functionality (in a composable way) or to see if some of the possible use cases could be handled by more portable options.

I am happy to do the work to try and move this forward, but I just wanted to ask the question in here to check what the right process would be? Would it be appropriate to create a PR for stabilization?

There is a tracking issue cargo#9426

@Daniel Frampton Yeah, I think it'd be appropriate to propose a stabilization PR (including updating the documentation and the testsuite to no longer treat it as unstable), and we can consider that in our next meeting.
